title: Eric Pen
text:
Eric Pieroun Pen is a <a href="Cambodian%20American">Cambodian American</a> <a href="heavyweight">heavyweight</a> <a href="boxer">boxer</a> from <a href="California">California</a>, USA but represents <a href="Cambodia">Cambodia</a>. He is an <a href="Orthodox%20stance">orthodox</a> fighter. He won the <a href="WBA%20Asia">WBA</a> Asia <a href="heavyweight">heavyweight</a> weight title (<a href="WBA%20Asia">WBA Asia</a>) in Saturday 15, February 2020 according to <a href="Boxrec">Boxrec</a>,Currently he an 83% ko percent.
Professional career.
In his professional career so far he has 6 wins, 0 losses, and 0 draws, but Pen has not had a fight since Saturday 15, February 2020 according to <a href="Boxrec">Boxrec</a>. Most of his fights have been in <a href="Asia">Asia</a>. His first pro boxing fight was in Thailand Ram 100 Thai Boxing Stadium, Ramkamhaeng, <a href="Bangkok">Bangkok</a>.
